purpose: Configures RTL-SDR hardware and software for software-defined radio.
notes: This module enables RTL-SDR (Realtek Software Defined Radio) support, adding user 'John88' to the plugdev group for device access, and installing udev rules. It provides a suite of SDR applications including GQRX (graphical receiver), SDR++ (modern interface), and GNU Radio (powerful signal processing framework). USB utilities and rtl-sdr tools are also included. Reasoning: Sets up a complete SDR environment for radio frequency analysis, signal decoding, and amateur radio experimentation.
